p: All of the animal studies were approved by the Jiangsu Administrative Committee for Laboratory Animals (Permission number: SYXKSU-2007-0005) and complied with the guidelines for laboratory animal welfare and ethics of the Jiangsu Administrative Committee for Laboratory Animals. All experiments involving live viruses and animals were performed in negative-pressure isolators with high efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters in animal biosafety level 3 (ABSL-3) facility in accordance with the institutional biosafety manual.
